Package local.media

Interface Summary
AudioClipPlayerListener Listener for AudioClipPlayer.
JMediaReceiverListener JMediaReceiverListener.
 

Class Summary
AudioClipPlayer Plays an audio file.
AudioInput AudioInput allows the access of system audio input in pure-java manner.
AudioOutput AudioOutput allows the access of system audio output in pure-java manner.
AudioReceiver AudioReceiver is a pure-java audio stream receiver.
AudioSender AudioSender is a pure-java audio stream sender.
ExtendedPipedInputStream ExtendedPipedInputStream.
ExtendedPipedOutputStream ExtendedPipedOutputStream.
G711 G.711 codec.
JMediaReceiver JMediaReceiver is a JMF-based media receiver.
JMediaSender JMediaSender is a JMF-based media sender.
JVisualReceiver JVisualReceiver is a JMF-based graphical media receiver.
Mixer MixerLine is a simple G711 mixer with M input lines (OutputStreams) and N output lines (InputStreams).
MixerLine MixerLine is a simple G711 mixer with N input lines (InputStream) and one output line (the MixerLine itself).
RtpStreamReceiver RtpStreamReceiver is a generic stream receiver.
RtpStreamSender RtpStreamSender is a generic stream sender.
RtpStreamTranslator RtpStreamReceiver is a generic stream receiver.
SplitterLine SplitterLine is a simple splitter with one input line (the SplitterLine itself) and N output lines (OutputStreams).
ToneInputStream Generates a single tone.
UdpStreamReceiver UdpStreamReceiver is a generic stream receiver.
UdpStreamSender UdpStreamSender is a generic stream sender.
